subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Bolt’s dominance in the 100 and 200 meters is expected to be tested at the world track and field championships in Beijing next week by Gatlin, a formerly barred runner from the United States.
snippet: Bolt’s dominance in the 100 and 200 meters is expected to be tested at the world track and field championships in Beijing next week by Gatlin, a formerly barred runner from the United States.
